price: সিহঁতৰ বাবে কাঁইটবিশিষ্ট ঘাঁহৰ বাহিৰে আন কোনো খাদ্য নাথাকিব,
arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: laysa lahum ṭaʿāmun illā min ḍarīʿin
